insert_code_from_authenticator_app: Please insert verification code from your authenticator app
scan_totp_qr_code: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
activate_totp_by_verification_code_from_: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
start_by_creating_admin_account: Start by creating your first administrator account
totp_setup_is_not_completed_for_this_acc: TOTP setup is not completed for this account
new_version_is_available: New version ({new_version_number}) of {app_name} is available, you are currently running version {old_version_number}. To view more information click the '{show_button_name}' button below.
configure_how_the_user_interface_looks_a: Configure how to the user interface looks and functions
display_new_version_alert: Display alert when a new version of {app_name} becomes available
failed_to_create_new_user_account: Failed to create new user account
do_you_really_want_to_delete_this_user: Do you really want to delete this user?
account_preferences_are_currently_stored: Currently account preferences are stored only in your browser. If you access {app_name} from a different browser and/or device you will have to configure them again. In the future the goal is to store them globally, but that is not the case today. Thank you for your understanding.
do_you_really_want_to_delete_your_totp: Do you really want to delete your TOTP? This action will require you to login again.
how_the_email_was_handled_so_far: How the email was handled so far
data_specific_to_this_email_used_to_pers: Data specific to this email used to personalize content across the template
your_applications_and_services_that_send: Your applications and services that send emails using {app_name}
name: Name
do_you_really_want_to_delete_this_client: Do you really want to delete this client?
api_tokens_used_to_authenticate_this_cli: API tokens used to authenticate this client
do_you_really_want_to_delete_this_client: Do you really want to delete this token? Applications using this token will no longer be able to send emails.
please_copy_your_new_token_and_store_it_: Please copy your new token and store it securely. You will not be able to see the token value after you close this window.
services_that_app_uses_to_deliver_your_e: Services that {app_name} uses to deliver your emails
do_you_really_want_to_delete_this_sender: Do you really want to delete this sender?
your_configuration_schema_is_invalid: Your configuration schema is invalid. It was probably created on an older version of {app_name} and is mising some fields. Before you can update this sender you will need to migrate it, until then you will not be able to update this sender and it may not work properly. Note that when you migrate the schema it will not be updated until you save changes. Your old value will be preserved.
confirmation_of_new_order_with_order_id_: Confirmation of new order with order ID and list of purchased products
do_you_really_want_to_delete_this_templa: Do you really want to delete this template?
how_to_send_email_using_this_template: How to send email using this template
template_could_not_be_rendered_you_proba: Template could not be rendered. You probably have unfinished Handlebars directive.
subject: Subject
these_variables_are_used_to_render_previ: These variables are used to render preview of this template. They are not stored anywhere and will not be used to render actual emails
data_than_can_be_passed_into_this_templa: Data that can be passed into this template to personalize it
do_you_really_want_to_delete_the_whole_s: Do you really want to delete the whole schema?
how_to_create_templates_description: In {app_name}, you can create email templates in text or HTML format. Templates use Handlebars syntax, allowing you to insert dynamic variables to personalize content. All variables must be defined in the {schema_tab_name} tab before use, you can adjust preview variables to see how your email will look with real data. Handlebars can also be used in the email subject, making it easy to personalize both the content and the subject line.
import_templates_from_backup_or_other_in: Import templates from backup or other instance of {app_name}
export_template_to_back_them_up_or_move_: Export templates to back them up or move to a different instance of {app_name}
drag_and_drop_your_templates_export: Drag and drop your templates export
emails_that_could_not_be_delivered: Emails that could not be delivered
emails_that_could_not_be_sent: Emailt that could not be sent
overview_of_sent_emails_each_day: Overview of sent emails each day
